about_the_game:
This is a story DLC, it will add a new story to the game that you can progress through separately from the main storyline.

When moving day came, Aika was ready for a new adventure. She loaded all her things and set off on the road. It was a long drive, but Aika was not bored: she looked out the window at the changing scenery, listened to music and dreamed about how she would finally see her sister after so many years of separation.

Features

  • Continuation of the story about the difficult relationship of two sisters
  • Quality graphics in anime style
  • Great musical accompaniment
